metadata.title: CVE-2019-7282 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In NetKit through 0.17, rcp.c in the rcp client allows remote rsh serversto bypass intended access restrictions via the filename of . or an emptyfilename. The impact is modifying the permissions of the target directoryon the client side. This is similar to CVE-2018-20685.

criterions.comment: netkit-rsh: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
